p: In addition, seven (07) species of plants inventoried in this study are on the IUCN Red List as Near Threatened ( Cajanus cajan (L.) Millsp., Eucalyptus camaldulensis Dehnh.); Vulnerable ( Afzelia Africana Pers. , Garcinia kola Heckel , Gossypium hirsutum L. , Khaya senegalensis (Desr.) A. Juss.); and Endangered ( Pterocarpus erinaceus Poir.).
